metadata.Title: CVE-2014-9015 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Drupal 6.x before 6.34 and 7.x before 7.34 allows remote attackers to hijack sessions via a crafted request, as demonstrated by a crafted request to a server that supports both HTTP and HTTPS sessions.

criterions.comment: drupal7: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
